short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Check out our new Chrome Extension - "Fanatical PC Game Price Comparison"
short.de: Schauen Sie sich unsere neue Chrome-Erweiterung an – „Preisvergleich für Fanatical PC-Spiele“
short.es: Echa un vistazo a nuestra nueva extensión de Chrome: "Comparación de precios de juegos de PC Fanatical"
short.fr: Découvrez notre nouvelle extension Chrome - "Comparaison des prix des jeux PC Fanatical"
short.hu: Tekintse meg új Chrome-bővítményünket – „Fanatical PC Game Price Comparison”
short.it: Dai un'occhiata alla nostra nuova estensione Chrome: "Confronto prezzi giochi per PC Fanatical"
short.ja: 新しい Chrome 拡張機能「Fanatical PC ゲームの価格比較」をチェックしてください。
short.ko: 새로운 Chrome 확장 프로그램인 "Fanatical PC 게임 가격 비교"를 확인해 보세요.
short.nl: Bekijk onze nieuwe Chrome-extensie - "Fanatical pc-game prijsvergelijking"
short.pl: Sprawdź nasze nowe rozszerzenie do przeglądarki Chrome — „Fanatical porównanie cen gier na PC”
short.pt_PT: Confira nossa nova extensão do Chrome - "Comparação de preços de jogos para PC Fanatical"
short.ru: Ознакомьтесь с нашим новым расширением Chrome — «Fanatical сравнение цен на игры для ПК».
short.sv: Kolla in vårt nya Chrome-tillägg - "Fanatical PC Game Price Comparison"
short.tr: Yeni Chrome Uzantımıza göz atın - "Fanatical PC Game Price Comparison"
short.zh_CN: 查看我们新的 Chrome 扩展程序 - “Fanatical PC 游戏价格比较”
short.zh_TW: 查看我們新的 Chrome 擴充功能 - “Fanatical PC 遊戲價格比較”

long.de: Laden Sie hier unsere neue Erweiterung herunter: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fanatical-pc-game-price-c/fifbkhhgkgphkjjnjkgdfknbkkgapnca
long.it: Scarica la nostra nuova estensione qui: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fanatical-pc-game-price-c/fifbkhhgkgphkjjnjkgdfknbkkgapnca
long.ja: 新しい拡張機能をここからダウンロードしてください: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fanatical-pc-game-price-c/fifbkhhgkgphkjjnjkgdfknbkkgapnca
long.zh_TW: 在這裡下載我們的新擴充功能：https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fanatical-pc-game-price-c/fifbkhhgkgphkjjnjkgdfknbkkgapnca
